title: Hovenweep National Monument: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 2 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Hovenweep National Monument Explore the Dark Skies      Location: Hovenweep visitor center Fees: free     Saturday, August 20, 2016 Every Saturday Weekly  from 04/16/2016 to 10/01/2016 Join rangers for a tour of the night sky through our telescopes.     View Details      Hovenweep National Monument Founders Day Celebration      Time: 9:00 AM to 4:00 PM Location: Moab Information Center - corner of Center and Main streets, Moab Fees: Free     Thursday, August 25, 2016 Join rangers from Arches, Canyonlands, Hovenweep, and Natural Bridges at the Moab Information Center at the corner of Center and Main streets as we celebrate the 100th anniversary of the National Park Service.
